about_the_game:
Start your journey as a group of outcasts to slowly find your place inside a dystopian high-rise cybercity full of opportunities and contrasts. Keep satisfying the needs of each member, get them a safe house, collect cash one way or another, make necessary connections and expand to neighboring districts.


AI-driven crew
Hire members, equip them and give something to do - every crew member awaits orders and a plan, and each of them has their own way of doing things. Find a way to reach them and send to places where they can fully use their individual pros.


Top of the food chain
Dash through the ground floors of the low level city, deal with everything and everyone who wants to exploit you, get to the districts above and eventually see the sun through a slightly less polluted air.


Dark & dystopian city
Dive in a polluted, rusty but always vibrant city. Beware the cops and corps, find your way to survive whether it's a new business, getting things done for other crews or just looting around.


Cybertech equipment
Make technology work for you. Buy, craft, repair and install cyberware on your gang members to increase their stats and a chance to win against the City.

content_descriptors.notes: Expect many gun fights, explosions and strong language.

detailed_description:
Start your journey as a group of outcasts to slowly find your place inside a dystopian high-rise cybercity full of opportunities and contrasts. Keep satisfying the needs of each member, get them a safe house, collect cash one way or another, make necessary connections and expand to neighboring districts.


AI-driven crew
Hire members, equip them and give something to do - every crew member awaits orders and a plan, and each of them has their own way of doing things. Find a way to reach them and send to places where they can fully use their individual pros.


Top of the food chain
Dash through the ground floors of the low level city, deal with everything and everyone who wants to exploit you, get to the districts above and eventually see the sun through a slightly less polluted air.


Dark & dystopian city
Dive in a polluted, rusty but always vibrant city. Beware the cops and corps, find your way to survive whether it's a new business, getting things done for other crews or just looting around.


Cybertech equipment
Make technology work for you. Buy, craft, repair and install cyberware on your gang members to increase their stats and a chance to win against the City.
name: Dystopians

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: A cyberpunk colony simulator where you take over, manage & build bases, create & lead the crew to survive in a dark cybercity. Every member of the society makes their own decisions based on various factors and stats, for you is to decide and point out what would be best to do next!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
